title: Carbon Footprint Estimation System
intro: Modular Python solution to calculate total $\text{CO}_2$ emissions for individuals/households. Helps users understand and improve eco habits.
req: Input modules for transport, appliances, dietary habits, waste, and lifestyle choices. Customizable user profiles (e.g., student, family of four). Dynamic weighting based on organizer data.
output: Output graphs OR a summary table showing emission breakdowns.

title: Energy-Efficient Path Planner
intro: A graph-based route optimization program for eco-routing and smart mobility.
req: Input: roads, distances, traffic levels, fuel cost OR EV consumption rates. Weighted graph where edges represent energy usage. Algorithm: Dijkstra, A*, or custom heuristic.

title: City Temperature Trend Analyzer
intro: A CSV-based analysis tool for climate logs over a decade. Supports urban climate planning.
req: Parse large datasets. Detect anomalies like sudden heat-wave spikes. Apply rolling averages OR basic regressions. Optional: simple graph visualizations.

title: Smart Irrigation Simulation Model
intro: A moisture-aware irrigation optimizer, aligning with smart agriculture.
req: Inputs: soil moisture, humidity %, rainfall forecast, crop type.
output: Water required per cycle, Alerts for overwatering, A day-by-day irrigation plan.

title: Air Quality Index (AQI) Predictor
intro: A basic regression Machine Learning (ML) model useful for health and pollution monitoring.
req: Restrictions: Only $\text{sklearn}$ basics. Small datasets. Summary of contributing factors.

title: Flood Risk Detection Program
intro: Risk calculation based on rainfall intensity and terrain data. Helps with early warning systems.
output: Colored outputs (Low, Moderate, High, Critical) indicating risk level.

title: Forest Fire Early Alert System
intro: Predicts fire risk from key weather variables. Highly relevant for dry-season alerts.
req: Predicts fire risk from temperature, humidity, and wind speed.
output: Fire index, Risk category, Preventive suggestions.

title: Climate-Aware Smart Home Scheduler
intro: Shifts tasks (laundry, charging, cooling) to low-energy hours. Useful for smart home automation.
output: Optimized hourly schedule, Energy saved in $\text{kWh}$.

title: Waste Segregation Tracking App
intro: Tracks daily waste categories and predicts monthly trends. Supports zero-waste goals.
req: Functions must include: Waste logging, Recyclable percentage calculation, Trend forecasting.

title: Green Campus Resource Monitor
intro: A logging and analytics system for campus electricity/water usage. Helps administrators monitor resource efficiency.
req: A logging and analytics system for campus electricity/water usage.
output: Weekly efficiency reports, Usage graphs, Alerts for unusual spikes.
